name: Crash-A-Stack
description:
So you think yourself a great driver but love crashing into other cars? 

What if you didn't create (emotional?) damage to the vehicle but something entirely different happened? 

Play Crash-A-Stack and find out what will happen when this game puts you in the driving seat for this entry in the Holistic3D Game Jam 2022 with the theme "WELL THAT WASN'T SUPPOSED TO HAPPEN". 

Your time will be gone in 60 seconds, so do crash into green cars but do not crash into red cars.

Drive using the arrow keys but if you get stuck, pressing the Esc key will drift you out of the game. 

Enjoy!
